DOC.brief_summary: The purpose prospective , randomize , control three-year study compare effect year-long financial education program versus usual care health outcome single mother low income household .
DOC.brief_title: Finances First : A Health Intervention Low Income Single Mother Households
DOC.criteria: Unmarried Currently employ Annual salary must less 200 % Federal Poverty Guideline Supporting least one child home Able read speak either English Spanish Currently abuse alcohol recreational drug Currently live domestic violence situation Pregnant planning become pregnant next year
